NavigationTransition.summary: The NavigationTransition interface of the {{domxref("Navigation API", "Navigation API", "", "nocode")}} represents an ongoing navigation, that is, a navigation that hasn't yet reached the or stage.

remarks.para: It is accessed via the property.

-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer
-Navigation API live demo (view demo source)

NavigationTransitionFinished.summary:
The finished read-only property of the
interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills at the same time the event fires, or rejects at the same time the event fires.

remarks.para:
-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer

NavigationTransitionFrom.summary:
The from read-only property of the
interface returns the that the transition is coming from.

remarks.para:
-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer

NavigationTransitionNavigationType.summary:
The navigationType read-only property of the
interface returns the type of the ongoing navigation.

remarks.para:
-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer

NavigationTransitionNavigationType.value: An enumerated value representing the type of ongoing navigation.The possible values are:
